Package com.intellij.codeInsight.template.impl

Interface TemplateOptionalProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeBlockReformattingProcessor, GroovyShortenFQNamesProcessor, ShortenFQNamesProcessor, ShortenToStaticImportProcessor

    public interface TemplateOptionalProcessor
    An extension controlling aspects of Live Template insertion, like reformatting, adding imports, etc. getOptionName() allows to show a checkbox to enable/disable specific such aspect in Live Template settings, processText(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.codeInsight.template.Template, com.intellij.openapi.editor.Document, com.intellij.openapi.editor.RangeMarker, com.intellij.openapi.editor.Editor) does the actual modifications during live template expansion.

    During indexing, processText(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, com.intellij.codeInsight.template.Template, com.intellij.openapi.editor.Document, com.intellij.openapi.editor.RangeMarker, com.intellij.openapi.editor.Editor) is executed only for instances implementing DumbAware.

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<TemplateOptionalProcessor> EP_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • processText

        void processText(Project project,
                 Template template,
                 Document document,
                 RangeMarker templateRange,
                 Editor editor)
        Invoked inside a write action when a live template is finished. Note that this happens even if the corresponding option is disabled, so the implementations should check themselves whether they have to perform any actions.

      • getOptionName

        java.lang.String getOptionName()
        Returns:
        the text of a checkbox in Live Template settings controlling whether this option is enabled.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled(Template template)
        Returns:
        whether this processor is enabled for a given template

      • setEnabled

        default void setEnabled(Template template,
                        boolean value)
        Change whether this processor is enabled for a given template. It's invoked, for example, when a user changes the value of the corresponding checkbox in Live template settings.

      • isVisible

        default boolean isVisible(Template template,
                          TemplateContext context)
        Returns:
        whether a checkbox for this template should be shown in the configuration dialog, with the given template context.

      • isVisible

        @Deprecated
default boolean isVisible(Template template)
        Deprecated. Please override isVisible(Template, TemplateContext)
